summary: HAD TO REPLACE FRONT TIE RODS AND BOTTOM PLATE HOLDING RIGHT FRONT STRUT.  PART FAILED AGAIN AND REPLACED THE PLATE AND STRUT A YEAR LATER.  STILL, PROBLEM OF ROUGH RIDE ON ANY BUMP, CRACK OR RUT IN THE STREET OCCURS.  APPEARS THAT FRONT SUSPENSION IS NON-EXISTENT EXCEPT ON SMOOTH STREETS AND FREEWAY.  HATE DRIVING THIS CAR.  ONLY HAS 68,000 MILES ON IT NOW.    *TR
